get.summary: Get all vehicles for authenticated user

post.description: Add a new vehicle with images and all details. Only authenticated users can create vehicles. The vehicle will be automatically assigned to the authenticated user.
post.summary: Create a new vehicle listing (Authenticated users only)

parameters.description: Fuel type (benzina, motorina, electric, hibrid, gpl, hybrid_benzina, hybrid_motorina)
parameters.name: fuel_type

parameters.description: Body type (sedan, suv, break, coupe, cabrio, hatchback, pickup, van, monovolum)
parameters.name: body_type

parameters.description: Index of the image to use as featured (0-based, default: 0)
parameters.name: featured_image_index

get.description: Retrieve a vehicle with all its details and images using UUID. Only accessible by vehicle owner or admin.

put.description: Update a vehicle listing using UUID

get.description: Public endpoint to retrieve all active vehicles with optional search and filtering. No authentication required. Perfect for browsing and searching the vehicle marketplace.
get.summary: Get all vehicles with search and filters (Public)

parameters.description: Search by title, brand, model, or description
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Filter by fuel type (benzina, motorina, electric, hibrid, gpl, hybrid_benzina, hybrid_motorina)
parameters.name: fuel_type

parameters.description: Filter by body type (sedan, suv, break, coupe, cabrio, hatchback, pickup, van, monovolum)
parameters.name: body_type

get.description: Public endpoint to retrieve a curated list of recommended vehicles. Returns recent, high-quality vehicles with images. Perfect for homepage or featured sections. No authentication required.

parameters.description: Number of vehicles to return (default: 10, max: 50)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Public endpoint to retrieve detailed information about a specific vehicle using its SEO-friendly slug. Returns all vehicle details, images, and specifications. No authentication required.
